name: Police Car Driver Sim 2018
description:
Be a racer of high speed car driving racing games, catch crime transporters by playing this police driving games. Be aware of the rush and thrill of chasing and smashing all those crime crooks that pose a threat to the peace in this big city! Dont worry about your car if your car get stuck we have car mechanic simulator where your car will get repaired and ready to go out as high speed racing car game. Choose a car of your own choice it can be civic driving simulator, crazy taxi police game or a high speed crazy street driving game but you got to accept the police chase in car challenge to stop crime transporters. Use the help of our car mechanic simulator whenever need.


Features of Police Chase Adventure Sim 3D:
• Realistic police driving experience
• Vibrant 3D suburban city environment
• Extreme Visuals and sounds effects
• Smooth and simple controls
• Many Up-to-date Police cars to unlock
• Upgrade your car to hunt down the most wanted criminals
• Realistic Car Physics
• Thrilling gameplay
